The Catholic Church needs to change some things. Many people are leaving the Church. I think it is because the Church is not accepting of new ideas. They have strong views on things like gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. These views are a little old-fashioned.

If the Church changes its views, people will not leave. But the Church is not changing. Many people disagree with the Church on these issues. They think the Church has the wrong view.

If you are for abortion or gay marriage, you may not want to be part of a Church that says these things are wrong. You might feel uncomfortable going against what the Church believes.

The Church does not want women priests. The Church says priests are married to God. But everyone has a family and other people they love. Priests should be able to have families and love their families too.

The Church should change its rules. Priests should be able to get married and have families. This would not hurt the Church. It would make priests happy and help them be good leaders.

I think gay marriage should be allowed. I don't think being gay is a choice. Some people are born gay. They can't help it.

It's not right to hold them responsible for something they can't control. It's like being left-handed or having blue eyes. These are things people are born with.

It's wrong to say a man and a woman can get married, but two people of the same sex can't. This is not fair.

The federal government should not get involved in this issue. It's not a security issue or a moral issue. It's just about people being who they are.

People are born gay. They shouldn't be punished for it. The government should not tell them they are wrong.

The government should not try to control people's private lives. They should let people be who they are.

This is just my opinion. I think it's fair to let everyone be equal.

I think gay marriage should be legal. There is no good reason not to.

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to straight families. But this is not true. It's a different kind of love and family.

It's like two sides of the same coin. You can't compare them. 

Gay couples have the same rights as straight couples. They should have the right to own property and get medical care together.

If a gay person is sick, their partner can't visit them in the hospital. This is not fair. They should be able to be together.

Many studies have shown that gay couples are happy and successful. They have the same factors that make a relationship good.

Gay people are not asking for a church wedding. They want a marriage certificate from the government.

The government should not make laws based on one person's or group's religion. This is called separation of church and state.

If a couple has a civil union, why can't they get married? It's the same in many ways.

Some people worry about adoption and children. But children of gay couples are the same as children of straight couples. They need love and care.

In New York City, there are special schools for children of gay parents. They face problems in public schools.

Gay couples can be good parents. They can be involved in their community like straight couples.

The federal government should make gay marriage legal everywhere. The amendment that bans it is not fair.

President Bush has strong opinions about this. He thinks it's against his religion. But morality is different for everyone.

We should not make laws just because some people don't like it. We should think about what's fair for everyone.

Some people think gay people are damaged or have a personality defect. But this is not true. The American Psychological Association says so.

We should listen to experts, not just what our friends or church say. If we do, we might see things differently.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. Just because a medicine is not allowed does not mean it has good effects. I think it is wrong to say it should be available to the public, but it may be good to use it for medical reasons.

Some medicines are not allowed, but we use them in the pharmacy because they are good for people. For example, oxycodone and Vicodin are controlled medicines. We use them often because they help people. If people think marijuana is bad because it is not allowed, they should consider its good effects.

Marijuana is not like alcohol. If you use too much of either, it can cause problems. However, it is not the same. I think we should not use it suddenly. Instead, we should make it clear that it is not bad, and people will use it responsibly.

Many people think marijuana is bad because it is not allowed. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change the way people think about marijuana, they may use it responsibly.

I think the church has changed over time to fit the 21st century. It's not as strict as it used to be. I grew up going to church every Sunday. I would wear nice clothes and shoes that matched. My church was in a private school, and I saw my friends there on weekends. They had a teenage mass that was shorter, only 30 minutes long. People dress more casually now, even for morning masses. They wear jeans and khakis. This is a big change. 

I don't think changing the rules, like allowing female priests or married priests, would have stopped the problems with some priests and children. Some men are married and still have these problems. It's not because they can or can't get married. It's because of who they are. 

There are other religions where priests can be married. For example, some ministers in the Seventh Day Adventist church can get married. If they want to be married and practice their faith, they might choose a different church. 

I think the reason some priests did bad things is because of their own feelings, not because of their job. People are born with certain feelings, like being attracted to children. It's not because of how they were raised. The church couldn't have prevented these problems.

If some priests knew about the problems and kept it secret, that's wrong. But I don't think that's the case for all priests. 

I don't have any other thoughts about the Catholic Church.

I was okay with the idea at first, but I think many people were still upset after the 9/11 attacks. They used the 9/11 attacks as a reason to go to war in Iraq. But there were other reasons, not just the 9/11 attacks.

The Bush administration said Saddam Hussein had arms of mass destruction, but this was not true. They connected Hussein to Osama Bin Laden and the 9/11 attacks. This makes me very angry.

The Bush administration told many lies to the American people. They have not admitted to these lies. Colin Powell, a high official, said he was not sure about the evidence when he talked to the UN.

I think this is very bad. It is against the law for government officials to lie. The Bush administration does not respect the law and the constitution. They have been trying to change the law since the 9/11 attacks.

I think the Bush administration wanted to go to war from the beginning. The treasury secretary said this in a book. He said George Bush, the younger, wanted to go to war because his father was angry at Saddam Hussein. Bush wanted to increase the country's oil supply.

This is not a good way to make decisions. The war has lasted too long. If we leave now, there will be problems. The country might become very violent and many more people will die.

The UN and the US are trying to find a new way. They want a group of neighboring countries to help keep order. But this might not be a good idea. Iraq's freedom will be a big problem.

The news says the new government is not working well. The parliament is not effective and the prime minister does not have control. A man named Muqtada al-Sadr is still a problem. His party has many seats in the parliament. There are many people who want to control the government, and this is causing problems.

I do not have a good answer to this problem.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. 

Let me think for a moment. 

In my opinion, the war in Iraq is not very important. We did not declare war on Iraq officially. It seems like we went to war because we thought Iraq was involved in the 9/11 attacks. 

I am not very interested in the details of the war. But I know we are staying in Iraq to try to build a democracy. We also want to get oil from Iraq. 

But I think we should not stay in Iraq. It makes many people unhappy. 

If we stay, we will have to try to build democracy. This will take a long time. If we leave, the people in Iraq will be angry with us. They will have to start all over again. 

I do not know what to say about the war. It is a very difficult topic. 

I think the war in Iraq should continue, but it should not be called a war. We should not use guns to show that we are powerful. 

We did not declare war on Iraq officially. A declared war needs the approval of Congress. 

I think we should try to help Iraq, but it is wasting our resources. It is also making President Bush look bad. 

The Vietnam War was also an undeclared war. It is now called a meaningless war. 

I do not know what to say. It is hard to make a decision. 

There are many families with sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to be safe, but I also do not want to hurt the people of Iraq. 

If we stay in Iraq, we will try to change their culture to be like ours. This will be bad for them. Their hate for the U.S. will grow, and the Al-Kaida group will get stronger. 

I think the war in Iraq will go on for a long time. It is a very complicated issue. 

That is my opinion.

I don't think it is right for a state to make something legal or not. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This means the government should not control what churches do.

The constitution is clear on this. If we try to make a new law that says something is not allowed, it goes against what is already written. That is not right.

Some people want to make it a law that one church's beliefs are more important than another's. Most Catholics and Christians do not agree with this idea. But it is not up to the government to decide what churches can or cannot do.

The separation of church and state is very important. It allows for freedom of religion in the United States. Some people want to change the constitution to make a new law. This would be wrong because it goes against what is already written.

It would be one of the only laws that restricts people, not the government. I don't think this is right.

I don't think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is trying to make this law because it is against his own beliefs as a Catholic. This shows he has a preference for one religion over others. Churches should decide this, not the president or the government.

There is no good reason to make this law, except for personal opinions. It will not help the economy, and it may even help society.

In short, the government should not be involved in what churches do. The constitution is clear, and we should follow it.

I want to talk about the war in Iraq.  The US government did not tell the American people the whole truth about why they wanted to go to war.  I think they used the attacks on September 11th to make people angry and want to fight.  But the two things were not connected.

I am against war and especially going to war to attack first.  The war in Iraq was like the war in Vietnam.  The US should have learned from their mistakes in Vietnam.  In Vietnam, the US tried to put in a new government and it did not work.  Many American soldiers died in the war.

The US government took out the Iraqi government and wanted to put in a new one.  But they were not prepared for what would happen after that.  There was a lot of violence and chaos.  The US is still trying to help the Iraqis build a new government.

I think the US government made a big mistake by going to war.  They did not plan for all the things that could happen.  The war has been going on for a long time and many American soldiers are still dying.  The US is trying to help the Iraqis learn to police their own country, but it is a slow process.

I do not think the US government was honest with the American people about why they went to war.  They said it would be a short and easy war, but it has not been.  It takes a long time to build a new government and make it successful.

It is hard to decide what to do in a situation like this.  If the US went to war, they should finish what they started.  But we also have to think about the American soldiers who are dying.  Why are we helping Iraq and not other countries?  I think it is because of the oil in Iraq.

The US government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they were not found.  We know North Korea has these weapons and we are not fighting them.  I do not think the US government is being honest about their decisions.

I hope the war ends soon and there is peace in Iraq.  But I do not think that will happen soon.

I support gay marriage. I have always supported it. It is a personal choice. Research shows that it may be caused by something in the brain, not by how people are raised.

It is not the government's job to decide who can and cannot be married. Marriage is a private matter between two people. It should be the same for everyone, no matter who they are.

I have friends who are in gay relationships. They are good people and they love each other. They are just like any other couple.

Some people think that being gay is a choice. But research says it may be something you are born with. It has nothing to do with how you are raised or your family.

Marriage is a private matter. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it without anyone knowing. But if two men or two women want to get married, it is a big public issue. It should be the same for everyone.

It is not fair to treat people differently because of who they love. Marriage is a personal choice, and it should be private.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. It's not private.

As an RA, I have seen this problem before. You put something on the internet, and it affects how people think of you. If you talk about hurting people or things, someone will see it. 

The internet is seen by everyone. If you are friends with someone on Myspace, you will see what they post. But it's not the school that sees it. Someone else sees it and tells the school.

The school must act on it. They can't ignore it in case something bad happens. They might be able to prevent it.

But it's hard to know what to take seriously. People sometimes joke online. Like what happened at my school. Someone overheard a student talking about something, and they called the school. They looked at the student's Facebook and found some things that might be jokes, but became serious in that situation.

When you put something on the internet, there's no privacy. If you don't want it out there, don't put it. If you don't want someone to see it, don't post it.

School officials should not be friends with students on Myspace and Facebook. If someone brings something to their attention, it's a different story. If there is a danger, they must take it seriously.

But officials should not monitor students' phone conversations or texts. If it's brought to their attention, then it's a different situation.

A teacher should not make a fake Facebook or Myspace account and friend their students. That's the same as monitoring them. I wouldn't friend my residents because I don't want to see what they do, especially if they post pictures of themselves drinking. That's not my place.

I think the war has lasted too long. 

The main reason was good at first - to give democracy to another country. 

But now, I think we are fighting for different reasons. Maybe we want to prove we are a strong country. 

Our motives may have been questionable from the start. We were involved in a disagreement with Saddam Hussein's country long ago. 

If we wanted to give democracy to a country with no fair government, that would be a good reason. But with personal problems involved, it wouldn't be fair. 

I think we made our point in the first few months. Starting the war was a statement in itself. 

But the war has lasted for many years. I think it has gone on too long.

If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a tyrant, that would be a good reason for war. But our reasons have changed. Now it seems we are fighting just to fight. 

We don't want to end the war without winning. 

I think the war has lasted long enough. The country's government will have to take care of itself soon. 

We are spending a lot of money on the war. This money could be used for our own problems, like poverty and bad roads. 

We have many problems at home that need money. We should spend it on things like healthcare and schools. 

Right now, our money is being used to lose the war and hurt our own citizens. 

That is all I think.

I have a question about something. 

You see, someone found out about this because they looked online. They went to a website and found some information. I don't think that's an invasion of privacy. If you put something on the internet, everyone can see it. 

On a website called Myspace, you need to have a friend to see someone's profile. But when you accept someone as a friend, you are giving them permission to see what you have on your profile. So, if you put something on the internet, many people may see it. 

I think it's good that someone found out about this. It may have saved a life. However, this is a problem. We can't have one person looking at everyone's online profiles all the time. That's not fair. 

We can't have someone's job be to look at everyone's profiles. That would be wrong. But, it depends on the situation. If someone is looking for information to help someone, that's different. 

I have a Facebook account, but I don't have a Myspace account. I worry about people seeing things about me online. There are people who can get information easily. I saw a TV show about this. A man got a girl's screen name and was talking to her on instant messenger in a few minutes. 

It's hard to protect your information online. People can see many things about you, like your pictures and your favorite classes. I try not to put too much on my Facebook. But it's hard because I want to be able to talk to my friends. 

I only accept people I know on Facebook. But you never know who can see what. My roommate told me that her high school banned students from having Myspace. I'm not sure if that was right. I don't know how the school had the right to tell students what to do.

The Iraq War is a big issue. I want to talk about it again. 

Some people say I'm a hypocrite for talking about it. I was against the war at first. But now I think it's not very important. Most people in the world think the war was a bad idea. 

Surveys in the United States, Iraq, and many other countries show this. About 75 to 80 percent of people think the war was a bad idea. Even 80 percent of Iraqi people and 70 percent of US soldiers in Iraq think so. 

I think the war was a disaster from the start. It's hard to make good decisions when there's a big difference in culture between the US and the Middle East. 

We tried to bring democracy to Iraq, but it's not what the people there wanted. Saddam was a bad leader, but we should have thought about the problems before going to war. 

Now, it's hard to find a good reason to stay in Iraq. I don't agree with the US government's ideas for staying there. If they want to leave slowly, I wouldn't be against that. But I don't see a reason why we can't leave now. 

Many Iraqis want us to leave. We're helping them, but they're telling us to go. I think they know what's best for their country. If we listen to them and leave, we won't be responsible if things get worse. 

If we help Iraq again after we leave, we might be seen as good people. We're not good people in the Middle East now, but it will be better than how things are today.

There is still a problem with gender discrimination in the United States. 

I think this is true in many workplaces. Women often face more difficulties because of a glass ceiling. This is like a barrier that prevents them from getting to a higher position. Even if there is equality, people often have trouble working under a woman.

This is because society has been this way for a long time. Many women see a job they can do well, but the board may not choose them for the position. This is because women are not often in important jobs.

The same thing happens to men and other groups. For example, men who stay at home to care for children are often looked down upon. Society thinks men should be the breadwinners. This can be hard on these men because they want to take care of their children.

In the fashion industry, many people do not take men seriously if they are interested in fashion. This is because men who like fashion are often different. People do not understand their style.

I think there is definitely gender discrimination in the U.S. Changing this is hard because society has a strong idea of how things should be. We have made progress, but it is slow. Women are now in important jobs and men are staying home to care for children. This is changing people's views.

We need to promote the good qualities of people who are often discriminated against. We should not push too hard, or people will resist. I think we are at a good point where this is happening slowly. I do not know if there is anything else we can do.

People from different places and with different backgrounds also face discrimination. For example, someone from a farm may not have perfect grammar, but they can be very smart. They may get a job as a CEO, but other men may not respect them because of their grammar.

This is another example of how people are often judged unfairly.

My understanding is that marijuana is not fully legal. But some places have made it not a crime. This means it is not a serious offense like a crime. It is more like a traffic ticket. You get cited and do not get arrested.

If you get a citation for marijuana, it can affect your future. This can make it harder to get a job. But some people say it is better to not make it a crime. This is because it costs a lot of money to arrest and put people in jail. Then the court has to deal with the case. This costs even more money.

Some cities do not have enough money. They do not want to make this change. But some cities, like Denver, are more open-minded. They think it is a good idea. They have more money to spend on important things like education and helping the elderly.

I think it is a good idea. But marijuana must be used carefully. It should not be everywhere. There are good reasons to be careful. If it is allowed everywhere, people might smoke and drive. This is not safe.

Marijuana can affect people in different ways. Some people are more careful and do not get into trouble. Others are not so careful. Alcohol can also be a problem. It can affect people's ability to think and move.

I think people react differently to substances like marijuana and alcohol. Some people can use them without trouble. Others get into trouble. We should be careful and think about how substances affect us.

I am having trouble making a decision on this issue. I do not know if one side is right or wrong. This is a very difficult topic. 

The separation of church and state is a problem. Also, defining marriage is hard. We do not want to upset anyone. 

I do not know if the government should decide what a marriage is. Marriage is sometimes a sacrament. People get tax breaks if they are married.

I grew up in a Christian home. This makes me think about gay marriage in a confusing way. I have many friends who are gay. I do not agree with their lifestyle. However, I think gay marriage should be allowed. It is not a national issue. Each state should decide for itself.

Many states are democratic or republican. Democratic states often support gay marriage. If you live in a democratic state, you know its opinion. You chose to live there. So, it's not your place to disagree with its decision. I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. Each state should decide whether to allow gay marriage.

I already said this. But I will say it again. I do not think the president should decide for the whole country. George Bush is not in every state. He should not decide how each state runs itself. Some things should be left to each state. He will be out of office soon. If a new president allows gay marriage, it will change again. Each state should decide for itself. They are the ones who will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is a public place on the internet. You can see what others post there. School officials have the right to check it. They can see what students post, even if it's not under the school's name. They can see it when they are at home.

If school officials check Myspace to stop students from hurting themselves or others, that's okay. It's their job to keep students safe. They want to make sure students are not doing anything bad.

Some people think it's an invasion of privacy when school officials check Myspace. But if it makes the school a safer place, it's not an invasion. School officials are just doing their job.

When you post something on the internet, anyone can see it. You can't take it back. That's why you have to be careful what you say online. School officials can't help but see what students post. They want to keep students safe.

Schools have rules and drills to keep students safe. They practice what to do in case of an emergency. School officials check Myspace to make sure students are not doing anything bad. They want to prevent bad things from happening, like a school shooting.

In this case, school officials were just trying to keep students safe. They checked Myspace to see if students were doing anything bad. They want to make sure students are safe in school.

I have mixed feelings about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea. I was affected by 9/11. I thought we should go to their country and stop their violence. But I think we made a mistake. We didn't think about the long-term effects.

We went to their country without a plan. I think that was a bad idea. It didn't work out well for us. I don't think we helped them. They will fight with each other, and they can't fight with us if they're busy fighting themselves.

I'm not interested in their problems. They can solve their own problems. I think they're a different kind of people when it comes to war. We think war is bad, but they see it as a way to get what they want.

We went to their country thinking we could change their country. But I don't think that's possible. They will always be the way they are. We should have thought before we acted. We should have made a plan.

I think we went to their country for revenge. President Bush wanted to go because people were angry after 9/11. I think he made a mistake, but I understand why he did it. We couldn't just let them do what they did and then do nothing.

We should have had a clear plan to create order in their country. But we didn't. We didn't know what we were doing. We didn't work together. That would have helped us.

I don't think we should stay in their country. We've made some progress, but not enough. If we leave, their country will collapse. We can't stay there forever. It's not good for us to stay there. We should leave and let them solve their own problems.
